meanings.definition: A device used in the oil industry to extract oil from underground reservoirs.
meanings.sent1: The pumpjacks hummed as they lifted oil from deep underground.
meanings.sent2: The pumpjacks in the field worked tirelessly to bring up the oil.
meanings.sent3: The pumpjacks seemed to dance as they pumped the oil out.
meanings.sent4: The pumpjacks were like busy bees, extracting the precious oil.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic motion of the pumpjacks was mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.definition: The action of operating a pumpjack to extract oil.
meanings.sent1: His job involved the constant operation of the pumpjacks.
meanings.sent2: The pumpjacks' movement signaled the start of oil extraction.
meanings.sent3: The pumpjacks' operator skillfully controlled their movements.
meanings.sent4: The pumpjacks' operation required precision and attention.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the pumpjacks in operation echoed across the field.

meanings.definition: A group of pumpjacks working together in an oil field.
meanings.sent1: The synchronized movement of the pumpjacks was impressive.
meanings.sent2: The oil field was dotted with numerous pumpjacks working in unison.
meanings.sent3: The pumpjacks in the field formed a mechanical orchestra.
meanings.sent4: The pumpjacks' teamwork efficiently extracted oil from the ground.
meanings.sent5: The pumpjacks' collective effort made the oil extraction process smooth.
